about_the_game:
Welcome to Bichito Clicker, a magical world of talking toasts where chaos is about to break loose.

In Bichito, you will take the role of the main character Ox, a warrior expert in drawing who, together with his most trusted pet friend, a talking toast, will seek to control the powers of an Emerald Elemental Stone through a pencil. At the same time, an evil version of Ox will absorb the powers of a corrupted crimson stone to fight and steal the emerald stone from Ox. Thus begins the story of Ox against Ozone's evil plan.



Clicker / Idle style game where you must use your skill and abilities by clicking on the Bichos on your screen to defeat them and thus obtain points to improve yourself and face other stronger Bichos.
detailed_description:
Welcome to Bichito Clicker, a magical world of talking toasts where chaos is about to break loose.

In Bichito, you will take the role of the main character Ox, a warrior expert in drawing who, together with his most trusted pet friend, a talking toast, will seek to control the powers of an Emerald Elemental Stone through a pencil. At the same time, an evil version of Ox will absorb the powers of a corrupted crimson stone to fight and steal the emerald stone from Ox. Thus begins the story of Ox against Ozone's evil plan.



Clicker / Idle style game where you must use your skill and abilities by clicking on the Bichos on your screen to defeat them and thus obtain points to improve yourself and face other stronger Bichos.
legal_notice:
BICHITO CLICKER Privacy Policy

By installing the application you indicate that you know and understand the following privacy policy points.

  • 1 - No user data of a personal nature is collected by this application.

  • 2 - No IP adresses are logged.

  • 3 - No user email accounts are accessed.

  • 4 - The application does not track or save data regarding times and hours of use.

  • 5 - The application does not save data related to your device such as crashes or failures, system activity, hardware settings, browser type, browser language.

  • 6 - The application does not access your contact list or schedules.

  • 7 - The application does not collect data about your real location.

  • 8 - Remarketing with Google AdMob: Vendors such as Google use first-level cookies and third-party cookies or other third-party identifiers to compile data about user interactions with ad impressions and other ad serving features.

  • 9 - Age classification: PEGI 3 - Suitable for all audiences.

  • 10 - Shieldering GameStudio is solely responsible for Bichito Clicker and its content.

  • 11 - Maintenance and Support: Shieldering GameStudio will be obliged to provide said maintenance or support.

  • 12 - Charges and fees: Any use of this application is completely free.

  • 13 - Changes to our Privacy Policy: Our Privacy Policy may change from time to time. Any privacy policy changes will be posted on this page, make sure to review it periodically.

  • 14 - Contact: If you have any questions about this Policy or to report any violation of the Policy, send an email to: .
